dct_title_s: Map of California, Oregon, Texas, and the territories adjoining, with routes &c
dct_description_sm: Shows topography, drainage, state boundaries, cities and towns, routes (e.g.: Doniphan's).
"Entered according to act of Congress in the year 1849 by J.H. Colton in the clerk's office of the district court for the southern district of New York."
dct_publisher_sm: J. H. Colton, No. 86, Cedar St.,
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Warren Heckrotte Map Collection courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain.  There are no restrictions on use.  If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
